pullRequest.title: Add search for subscription picker in the feed group dialog
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is it?

 Bug fix
 Feature
 Code base improvement
 Meta improvement to the project

Description of the changes in your PR
Let the user search for subscriptions in the feed group dialog.

Testing apk
feed-add-search-sub-list.apk.zip

nodes.bodyText:
You made it diacritic sensitive, and it's really annoying for languages with diacritics, because you never know if people have respected diacritics or not.
From this SO, collate Latin1_general_CI_AI (Case Insensitive Accent Insensitive) should do the job

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    ORDER BY name COLLATE NOCASE ASC
          
          
            
                    ORDER BY name COLLATE Latin1_general_CI_AI
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -16,6 +16,13 @@ abstract class SubscriptionDAO : BasicDAO<SubscriptionEntity> {
     @Query("SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY name COLLATE NOCASE ASC")
     abstract override fun getAll(): Flowable<List<SubscriptionEntity>>
 
+    @Query("""
+        SELECT * FROM subscriptions
+        WHERE name LIKE '%' || :filter || '%'
+        ORDER BY name COLLATE NOCASE ASC

beforeCommit.message:
Fix subscription picker items flickering in the feed group dialog

The adapter could not tell the items were the same because the
subscription class was missing some methods (i.e. equals and hashcode),
so a full rebind was being done.

afterCommit.message:
Fix subscription picker items flickering in the feed group dialog

The adapter could not tell the items were the same because the
subscription class was missing some methods (i.e. equals and hashcode),
so a full rebind was being done.

nodes.bodyText:
Here it seems like you are returning something even though the function is void, I find it confusing

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                return super.onBackPressed()
          
          
            
                                super.onBackPressed()

commit.message: Add search for subscription picker in the feed group dialog

Fix subscription picker items flickering in the feed group dialog

The adapter could not tell the items were the same because the
subscription class was missing some methods (i.e. equals and hashcode),
so a full rebind was being done.

so a full rebind was being done.
